plot: A propaganda film ordered by the Japanese Colonial government in Korea in an attempt to persuade Koreans that they were always Japanese citizens and to convince men to voluntarily join with the Japanese war efforts.
title: Jeolmeun moseub
plot_es: A propaganda film ordered by the Japanese Colonial government in Korea in an attempt to persuade Koreans that they were always Japanese citizens and to convince men to voluntarily join with the Japanese war efforts.
plot_en: A propaganda film ordered by the Japanese Colonial government in Korea in an attempt to persuade Koreans that they were always Japanese citizens and to convince men to voluntarily join with the Japanese war efforts.
